page.title: 08Health
page.content: Crail is a healthy unpolluted area. A surgery is attached to a medical practice based in Anstruther. A District Nurse visits. We also have an undertaker so people can easily be buried in the local churchyard. We have a chemist/pharmacist and a chiropody service. Slimnastics/Yoga classed have started. A welfare committee arrange a 'bus outing, presents and a Christmas party for the old people. The meals on wheels service also keeps a watch on the old. Our nearest hospital for emergencies is 10 miles away and it has only visiting consultants.A Red Cross car service takes visitors to Kirkcaldy General Hospital 25 miles away. Two houses have been built for disabled people.
